message.content:
cs.CV, cs.HC, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

This paper deals with machine learning perception problems and human-level classification performance, which are typically studied in the computer vision (cs.CV) and human-computer interaction (cs.HC) sub-categories. The study also involves exploring the relationship between resolution and classification performance, which is a common topic in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the paper mentions the potential applications of the derived heuristic in fields such as remote sensing, medical imaging, scientific imaging, and astronomy, which are typically studied in the information retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category.
